channel.title: NEED BloodScape V2 Host - Credit and {REWARD} will be given
channel.description:
I'm looking for someone to host my server.
I want as little lag as possible. It's a Silab Server with the FunScap3 Source (A Fair bit of editing though) and has fast leveling. I tried making the max level 135 but I dunno if it works (Won't let me test, says the port is already open :\)
The training room gives 3 times as much EXP as the normal FunScap3 does to reduce massing.
I'm looking for at least 12/7.
I've had 3 hosts. One that can only host for 4 hours, one that gave up and another one that is SUPPOSED to be 24/7 but isn't.
I want the server to be on around this time of day onwards.
My MSN is sirnubalots@hotmail.com
Credit will be given and {REWARD}
EDIT: THE REWARD IS NOT REAL LIFE MONEY!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
This server is unique!
You won't see too many FunScap3 Based servers like this!
The EXP has been octupled, the jad has moved spots, the Messages when you click things has chnged, you don't get annoying capes when you get to 99 in a skill, there are new Mod/Admin/Owner Commands and best of all, the max level is 135 (Combat is 253)!!!!
